subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Brad Evans scored the only goal and the host Columbus Crew denied D.C. United a Major League Soccer playoff berth Sunday with a win in their regular-season finale. The result gave the Red Bulls a wild-card spot.
snippet: Brad Evans scored the only goal and the host Columbus Crew denied D.C. United a Major League Soccer playoff berth Sunday with a win in their regular-season finale. The result gave the Red Bulls a wild-card spot.
